description.value:
You notice things that others can't see at all. While you're adjacent to an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} creature of your level or lower, it is instead only @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} from you. You only need a successful @Check[flat|dc:5|showDC:all] to target a hidden creature.

Special If you have the Heartbeat of the Forest feat, you no longer need to roll a Flat Check to target any @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} creature that is adjacent to you.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens The Mwangi Expanse
